price: 我拯救了他和他的家人，没有拯救他的女人，她是和其余的人同受刑罚的。
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-ahlahu illā im'ra-atahu kānat mina al-ghābirīna
